description: A convolution triangle of numbers obtained from A036068.
comments: a(n,m) := s1p(4; n,m), a member of a sequence of unsigned triangles including s1p(2; n,m)= A007318(n-1,m-1) (Pascal's triangle). Signed version: (-1)^(n-m)*a(n,m) := s1(4; n,m).
links: W. Lang, On generalizations of Stirling number triangles, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 3 (2000), #00.2.4.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
